contest-event.event-date:
June 12, 1905 D West Stanley Contest (Amateur Contest)
West Stanley Contest (Amateur Contest) 20 Test Piece Contest West Stanley Contest west-stanley-contest-amateur-contest-1
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
West Stanley, County Durham Prizes - 1sr £10, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £3, 5th £2. March contest 1st (£3) Heworth Colliery, 2nd (£1.10s.) South Moor, 3rd (10s.) Ouston Institute. It would appear that the march contest was combined with the Open Section Contest. 11 bands competed.
Feb. 11, 2012, 9:55 a.m. Sept. 6, 2018, 9:21 p.m.
1 Marley Hill Luke Harker
2 Felling Colliery Silver James Oliver
3 South Shields Harmonic J. A. Greenwood
4 South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band William Heap
5 Elemore Colliery James Young
6 Burnopfield Unknown
Unknown Result Bradley Shops Unknown
Unknown Result Houghton-le-Spring Unknown

Unknown Result Pelton Institute Unknown
Unknown Result South Pelaw Unknown
